description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dare you enter the PainBall Pyramid and take on eight very red, very mean, and very flat, AI players in a game of paintball? Evade with sprint, instant jump right or left, and duck!
